## Facility Status Overview

```{python}
import os, importlib.util

spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location(
    "facilities",
    os.path.join("..", "src", "visualizations", "facilities.py")
)
facilities = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
spec.loader.exec_module(facilities)

import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("../data/facilities.csv", parse_dates=["date"])  # also one level up
facilities.plot_facility_status_pie(df, width=700, height=500).show()

```
